about.description:
My name is Huwaida Rahman Yafie (Yafie), a fourth-year undergraduate student. I am studying Computer Science in Dian Nuswantoro University (Udinus), Semarang, Indonesia. 
 
 
 I consider myself as a curious person. I love to learn and explore new tech and tools. I'm currently interested in research on Software Engineering. Particularly in improving Software Engineering tasks by __building automated debugging and testing.__

technologies.title: Programming Language
technologies.description: Python, C++, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP

technologies.title: Data & Cloud
technologies.description: Docker, Apache Spark, Google BigQuery, SQL, Chameleon Cloud, Google Cloud Platform

technologies.title: ML/AI Libraries
technologies.description: TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, pandas, librosa, scikit-learn, Matplotlib

technologies.title: Web Development Frameworks
technologies.description: Next.js, React, Tailwind, Laravel, CodeIgniter, Bootstrap

projects.title: JAWS: Java Web Server
projects.description:
Java-based HTTP local web server desktop app. Supports custom port number and web directory. Total 300+ Lines of Codes (LOC).  
  
Tools used: __Java, Gradle, JavaFX Scene Builder, Bootstrap__

projects.title: bngky: Academic Chatbot Web App
projects.description:
Team project for Department of Computer Science. Demands high interactivity and responsiveness of user-friendly messaging experience with the bot which is built by LLM team.  
Tools used: __Next.js (TypeScript), React, FastAPI, TanStack Query, TailwindCSS, DaisyUI__

projects.title: EmoReg
projects.description:
Machine learning-powered web app to help voice actors in training. Trained the model based on RAVDESS and TESS dataset to recognize emotion types in audio files resulting in accuracy of 86.2. Total 600 Lines of Codes (LOC).  
Tools used: __Python, librosa, TensorFlow, Keras, Streamlit__

projects.title: Moshpit
projects.description: UI/UX prototype of Moshpit, a social music player. Moshpit enable users to interact with other users, even musicians. Moshpit presents interesting social features such as Listening Party and Support to Musicians.

projects.title: Evoku
projects.description:
Team project for Cryptography finals. Campus e-voting apps with data integrity validity checker using concept of hashing. Users will be able to check whether there has been a data tampering or not.  
Tools used: __Laravel, Bootstrap__

projects.title: Early Detection for Diabetes
projects.description:
Machine learning-powered web app to early detect diabetes based on observable physical conditions.  
Tools used: __Python, scikit-learn, Streamlit__

experiences.title: Research Intern (Remote)
experiences.description: Contributing in research for software systems under the supervision of Prof. Manish Motwani.

experiences.title: Computer Lab. Teaching Assistant
experiences.company: Faculty of Computer Science, Dian Nuswantoro University (Udinus)
experiences.description: Assisting lecturers during practical class in the Computer Lab for: *Algorithm and Data Structures (C++)*, *Database Systems (MySQL)*, *Intro to Programming (C++)*, *Intro to Computing (Data Viz., HTML)*.

experiences.title: Teaching Assistant
experiences.company: Department of Computer Science, Dian Nuswantoro University (Udinus)
experiences.description: Teaching and grading for Web Development Career Certification for 2 classes with 25 senior year students on each class. Facilitates and troubleshoots students with difficulty in working with capstone project.

experiences.title: Front-End Web Developer
experiences.company: AI Research and Development Group, Dian Nuswantoro University (Udinus)
experiences.description: Built the user-friendly, interactive and intuitive interface for Academic Chatbot web app. Encouraging to learn new technologies (i.e. frameworks)

awards.title: UChicago-Indonesia Remote Research Training Program
awards.description: A collaboration program between University of Chicago (USA) and Indonesia's Ministry of Higher Education, Research, And Science. Consisted of only 50 selected Computer Science-related field students across top universities in Indonesia.

awards.title: Excel Students of Year 2022
awards.description: Flagship program of Udinus's Department of Computer Science. One among 50 students selected from 800+ students of Year 2022.

researches.title: System and AI Research (SYAIR) Training Program
researches.description: International research training program (remote) by Indonesia's Ministry of Research and Higher Education and University of Chicago. Consisted of 50 selected Computer Science-related field students across top universities in Indonesia. Intensive research training on Computer Science areas. Including finding research areas and communities, skimming and reading a large amount of papers, downloading and reproducing multiple experiments from top-tier papers, and intensive training in English.
